test.name: create an issue list
test.url: library(Rlabkey) df <- data.frame(customInt=c(1:3), customString=c("aaa", "bbb", "ccc")) fields <- labkey.domain.inferFields(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", df) dd <- labkey.domain.createDesign(name="testissues", fields=fields) labkey.domain.create(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", domainKind="IssueDefinition", domainDesign=dd)

test.name: get the issue list domain info
